channel.title: Runing my client
channel.description: i made a client, and now it says this when i run. I used this guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,304353.0/topicseen.html, also i changed the thing to his run.bat files :} [code]Loading Client... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EUGI Caused by: java.land.ClassNotFoundException: EUGI at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPriviledged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)[/code] And so on for a few more lines (it says diff things too) then says Client Loaded, but client doesnt pop up :( Help plz

@chassy13 wrote:

It can’t find the EUGI class, try changing it to EGUI or executing it from another class.

item.title: Runing my client
item.dc:creator: @tehlobbiescape tehlobbiescape
item.description:
@tehlobbiescape wrote:

i made a client, and now it says this when i run. I used this guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,304353.0/topicseen.html, also i changed the thing to his run.bat files :}

Loading Client... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EUGI Caused by: java.land.ClassNotFoundException: EUGI at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPriviledged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
And so on for a few more lines (it says diff things too) then says Client Loaded, but client doesnt pop up Help plz

Read full topic
